column4: Hi. Does anyone know of a good video editor for linux? I need to work with non-standard resolutions (2.5:1) and have source material mostly in JPEG and a few movie clips. I've looked at Cinelerra and Kino but neither work well with 2.5:1 or large collections of photos (non-sequential). Alternatively a "regular slideshow program" with video support (which is really what I need). I used to do this with Sony Vegas on windows - anything like that wou
have you looked at ubuntu studio? http://ubuntustudio.org/
No never heard of it before now. Thanks
